short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension from Claro Money that will tell you how many hours you will have to work to buy a product!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to see how many hours you would have to work to pay for your eCommerce shopping basket. 

Based on the UK national average salary you can set your own salary in the setting and the extension will calculate the typical tax, national insurance contributions to give you a custom calculation based on your own take-home salary. 

The extension is designed to help everyone make considered decisions about their buying and see the reality of how much a shopping basket actually costs you in time.
